page.title: 05TADWORTH TOURNAMENT:A REPORT
page.content: Arriving at the{Tadworth Tournament the atmosphere was one of excitement. Some of the competitors had arrived and were warming up. As the races began spectators formed themselves around the edges of the track to cheer their team on. The teams were in colours each representing roads throughout Tadworth. When it came to the three - legged race two girls wearing wellies ran on a false start and could of won. When it came to the real start one of the girls wellies came off and they sat down laughing. Not surprisingly they came last! The trophy was eventually won by Yellow.{It was a day full of {fun.}It's the sort of event you would want to enter every year.
